name: Pocket Tamers 3D
description:
This is a new 3D RPG mobile game. In the game, players will become trainers taking the pets to the adventure! Defeat the monsters and the enemies to become winners. Many super gorgeous skills release with some special effects in the battle.This game is very easy to play, So let's get into the adventure world right now!


[Pet System] Many types of monsters for collection.

[ Illustrated Handbook] A necessary system for the collectors.

[Battle System] 3D images of battle mode.

[Ride system] Collect pets for riding mode.
